subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kerry Collins, the caretaker quarterback in Tennessee, is taking snaps for the only undefeated team left in the N.F.L. and is doing so by making significant contributions for the 8-0 Titans.
snippet: Kerry Collins, the caretaker quarterback in Tennessee, is taking snaps for the only undefeated team left in the N.F.L. and is doing so by making significant contributions for the 8-0 Titans.
